name: Bonescythe Breastplate
tooltip:
Bonescythe BreastplateLevel 60

Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Bonescythe Breastplate if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Breastplate, 25 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 2 Arcanite Bars and 6 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Breastplate
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 25
- Arcanite Bar x 2
- Cured Rugged Hide x 6
